event.title: was exploited by the Danish at least as far back as 1763

data.event: Belvedere was exploited by the Danish at least as far back as 1763.

event.title: was built by the Danish at Belvedere in 1795

data.event: A sugar mill was built by the Danish at Belvedere in 1795.
Today this is known as the Estate Belvedere, a lavish location for wedding receptions.
